t: Amazon's New Brand Store Quality Rating: What It Means for You
s: Amazon has introduced a new feature called the Brand Store quality rating. This tool provides valuable insights into how your Brand Store performs compared to others, along with personalized tips on how to make it even better. You can find these insights in your Brand's Store insights dashboard.
